annotations.description: I have a very personal connection to this drink and not just because it was one of the first of my creations put on a menu, which it was. But to find out why...
annotations.title: A Trip Down Memory Lane With The Pignoli Alexander

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Spiced Rum
.5oz (15ml) Dry Curaçao 
.5oz (15ml) Crème de Cacao
Top Whipped Heavy Cream
Garnish with Grated Chocolate

Stir and strain into coupe layer with shaken cream and garnish 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ZxqztD121g
title: Pignoli Alexander
